dc_title_s: Mine Drainage Treatment/Land Recycling Project Locations: Pennsylvania, 2018
dc_description_s: Mine Drainage Treatment/Land Reclamation Locations are clean-up projects that are working to eliminate some form of abandoned mine. The following sub-facility types are included: Abandoned Coal Refuse Pile Reclamation Abandoned Deep Mine Reclamation Abandoned Mine Drainage Treatment Abandoned Oil & Gas Well Reclamation Abandoned Surface Mine Reclamation Internal Monitoring Point
